Description:
alias for arista.git, which is where CVP is homed for ova builds.
 This repometadata is maintained by hand

required-for-merge.gerrit-checks-query: status:open ((((path:^aeris/cmd/turbine/main.go) OR (path:^docker-tar-template-vars.json) OR (path:^Makefile) OR (path:^cvp/app/changecontrol/.*) OR (path:^helm/onprem/.*) OR (path:^cvp/dist.Jenkinsfile) OR ((path:^cvp/java-backend/.* OR path:^cvp/cmd/.* OR path:^aeris/clickhouse/cmd/.* OR path:^service/cmd/.* OR path:^clover/cmd/.* OR path:^cmd/Collector/.* OR path:^aeris/cmd/load-checker/.* OR path:^aeris/cmd/gencert/.* OR path:^aeris/cmd/turbine/.* OR path:^aeris/cmd/bugalerts/.* OR path:^aeris/cmd/aeris/.*) AND (path:^.*Dockerfile OR path:^.*Makefile)) OR ((path:^aeris/.* OR path:^cvp/cmd/cvp-metrics/.* OR path:^zookeeper/.* OR path:^cmd/GNMIAdapter/.* OR path:^cmd/keysdump/.* OR path:^aeris/service/.* OR path:^resources/server/secret/vault/aeris/tool/.*) AND path:^.*Makefile)) AND branch:master) OR branch:cvp.salton OR ((path:^CvpTest/.*) AND (branch:master OR branch:cvp.rivers OR branch:cvp.quail OR branch:cvp.prosser))) AND -footer:{skip-RITS=true}
